nodes.name: GOVERNANCE
nodes.description: Defines the organizational structure, authority, and accountability mechanisms within the company.

nodes.name: Board Oversight
nodes.description: Establishes the board's role in overseeing management and corporate strategy.

nodes.name: Risk Management
nodes.description: Framework for identifying, assessing, and mitigating business risks.

nodes.name: Compliance
nodes.description: Ensures adherence to laws, regulations, and internal policies.

nodes.name: ETHICS & INTEGRITY
nodes.description: Sets the standards for business ethics, including guidelines for conflict of interest, bribery, and ethical conduct.

nodes.name: Code of Conduct
nodes.description: Outlines expected behaviors and ethical standards for all employees.

nodes.name: Anti-Corruption
nodes.description: Prohibits bribery and corrupt practices in all business operations.

nodes.name: Whistleblower
nodes.description: Protects individuals who report misconduct or illegal activities.

nodes.name: SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY
nodes.description: Outlines the company's commitment to corporate social responsibility (CSR) and sustainability.

nodes.name: Environmental
nodes.description: Addresses the company's impact on the environment and conservation efforts.

nodes.name: Community Engagement
nodes.description: Guides the company's involvement with local communities and charitable activities.

nodes.name: Sustainability
nodes.description: Focuses on long-term environmental, social, and economic sustainability.

nodes.name: STAKEHOLDER POLICIES
nodes.description: Guides how the company interacts with various stakeholders.

nodes.name: Employee Relations
nodes.description: Covers fair treatment, diversity, inclusion, and workplace safety.

nodes.name: Customer Relations
nodes.description: Establishes standards for customer service, privacy, and product quality.

nodes.name: Investor Relations
nodes.description: Ensures transparent and accurate communication with shareholders.

edges.description: Board oversight is a key component of corporate governance.
Risk management is essential to effective governance.
Compliance frameworks are established through governance policies.
The code of conduct is the foundation of ethics policies.
Anti-corruption measures are a critical aspect of ethical business practices.
Whistleblower protection supports ethical reporting of misconduct.
Environmental policies are a key component of social responsibility.
Community engagement is central to social responsibility initiatives.
Sustainability is a core focus of social responsibility policies.
Employee relations policies guide interactions with internal stakeholders.
Customer relations policies establish standards for external stakeholder engagement.
Investor relations policies ensure proper communication with shareholders.
Governance frameworks influence ethical standards and practices.
Ethical principles guide social responsibility initiatives.
Social responsibility impacts stakeholder relationships.
Governance structures affect stakeholder engagement approaches.
Compliance frameworks support anti-corruption efforts.
Whistleblower policies strengthen compliance mechanisms.
Environmental policies contribute to overall sustainability goals.
Customer relations often overlap with community engagement initiatives.
